doc:
Philippe Nahon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philippe_Nahon 0 For the French conductor of the same name (born 1946), see Ensemble Ars Nova (France).Philippe Nahon (French: [na.ɔ̃]; born 24 December 1938) is a French actor. Nahon is best known for his roles in French horror and thriller films, including I Stand Alone, Humains, Calvaire, Irréversible, The Pack and Haute Tension, and he has been featured as a nameless butcher in three films by Gaspar Noé – Carne, I Stand Alone, and Irréversible (cameo). For the_French_conductor of the_same_name ( born 1946 ) , see Ensemble_Ars_Nova ( France ) . Philippe_Nahon_(_French : [_na.ɔ̃_] ; born_24_December_1938 ) is a_French_actor . Nahon is_best_known for his_roles in French_horror_and_thriller_films , including I Stand Alone , Humains , Calvaire , Irréversible , The Pack_and_Haute Tension , and he has_been_featured as a_nameless_butcher in three_films by Gaspar_Noé – Carne , I Stand Alone , and Irréversible_(_cameo_) .
